column4: Tourism;Kampot: A ------beach is being constructed------ rapidly on a coastal area of ​​about 80 hectares in Teuk Chhou district
column7: ------ the new artificial beach in Kampot province is for both national and international tourists. Work is expected to finish by December 2019
column8: in time for the Sea Festival
column9: which is fast approaching.------Construction will mostly be completed before the Sea Festival
column11: but there has been a slight delay due to weather conditions
column12: which have hampered construction for several months. At the moment the beach is about 40 percent complete. ------SOURCE
